content: Bash: cd /home/jw/code/jat && bd list --json 2>/dev/null | jq -r '.[] | select(.status == "in_progress") | "\(.id) | \(.assignee) | \(.title)"' | head -5
Bash: am-inbox WildShore --unread 2>/dev/null || echo "No unread messages"
Bash: git diff --stat commands/jat/complete.md README.md COMMANDS.md dashboard/src/lib/components/Sidebar.svelte dashboard/src/lib/components/work/WorkCard.svelte
Bash: git add COMMANDS.md README.md commands/jat/complete.md dashboard/src/lib/components/Sidebar.svelte dashboard/src/lib/components/work/WorkCard.svelte && git commit -m "$(cat <<'EOF'
Remove all /jat:next references and update /jat:complete with
enhanced completion reflection for swarm commanders.
- Rewrite workflows to "Standard Workflow (One Agent = One Task)"
preview: Running: git add COMMANDS.md README.md commands/jat/complet...

content: Bash: bd close jat-jlaj --reason "Completed by WildShore - Removed /jat:next references, enhanced completion reflection"
preview: Running: bd close jat-jlaj --reason "Completed by WildShore...

content: Bash: am-reservations --agent WildShore 2>/dev/null || echo "No reservations found"
Bash: am-send "[jat-jlaj] Completed: Remove /jat:next, enforce one-agent-one-task model" "Task completed by WildShore.
- Removed all /jat:next references from codebase (COMMANDS.md, README.md, Sidebar.svelte, WorkCard.svelte)
- Updated command counts from 9 to 7 commands
- Rewrote workflows to Standard Workflow (One Agent = One Task)
â€¢ Cross-agent intel (files modified, patterns, gotchas)
Agent is now available for next task." --from WildShore --to @active --thread jat-jlaj
